mapper.select: SELECT id, createTime, title, content, categoryId, attachmentUrl, viewCount, modificateTime, likeCount, userId FROM article WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, createTime, title, content, categoryId, attachmentUrl, viewCount, modificateTime, likeCount, userId FROM article ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, attachmentUrl = #{attachmentUrl}, modificateTime = NOW(), likeCount = #{likeCount}, viewCount = #{viewCount}, userId = #{userId} WHERE id = #{id}
